event.name: Gearly Dungeon
event.desc: Conquer monsters to find treasure! Three star victories move you up levels while defeats drop you down! Attacks have no cap and stop recharging 6 hours before event end!

event_reward.desc: Complete the Dungeon at Rank 1.
Complete the Dungeon at Rank 2.
Complete the Dungeon at Rank 10 or higher.
Complete the Dungeon at Rank 25 or higher.
Complete the Dungeon at Rank 50 or higher.
Complete the Dungeon at Rank 100 or higher.
